rows.label: tlk70000066_05_msg0001
rows.name:
So, the time's finally upon us, huh?
I think we've made all the preparations
we can reasonably muster.

rows.label: tlk70000066_05_msg0002
rows.name:
We actually put together a secret
weapon, just in case this place gets
attacked again.

rows.label: tlk70000066_05_msg0003
rows.name:
We call it...the Monster Exterminatron
5000! Or ME5000 for short.

rows.label: tlk70000066_05_msg0004
rows.name:
As you might have guessed, it's actually
a modified version of the FF4000.
Dudan worked really hard on it!

rows.label: tlk70000066_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I don't know how he did it, but he
even managed to get the thing to fly!
Monsters won't stand a chance!

rows.label: tlk70000066_05_msg0006
rows.name:
Anyway, point is, we're gonna be just
fine here in the capital.

rows.label: tlk70000066_05_msg0007
rows.name:
So you go do whatever it is you
gotta do, yeah? We can fight evil
together on different fronts!
